body:
#965 Mumble with very low volume Windows 8

- **labels**:  --> audio, output, device
- Description has changed:

Diff:

~~~~

--- old
+++ new
@@ -1 +1,6 @@
-I just bought a new iBUYPOWER ceomputer and installed mumble but it doesnt seem to work. Everything is fine except the sound. Wehener i try to hear something the vodlumes i very low. I tried running the sound wizard a few times with no luck. When it come to the direction of sound part, i can hear everything perfectly! (when it goes from side to side) but then it just dies again. I tried every possible thing without luck. volume and audio work just fine on any other computer aspect. (ventrilo, youtube, itunes etc.)
+I just bought a new iBUYPOWER computer and installed Mumble, but it doesn’t seem to work.
+Everything is fine except the sound. Whenever I try to hear something the volumes are very low.
+I tried running the sound wizard a few times with no luck. When it gets to the direction of sound part, I can hear everything perfectly! (When it goes from side to side.) But then it just dies again.
+I tried every possible thing without luck.
+
+Volume and audio work just fine on any other computer aspect. (Ventrilo, YouTube, iTunes etc.)

~~~~

- **status**: open --> pending

#965 Mumble with very low volume Windows 8

Which version of Mumble?
Do you hear the audio on the third page of the audio wizard (“Device tuning”)?
